snippet: Mr. Sihanouk, who was alternately charming and ruthless, raised the stature of Cambodia and won its independence from French colonial rulers in 1953.
abstract: Norodom Sihanouk, charismatic Cambodian king who was a towering figure of leadership for six decades, dies at age 89.

byline.original: By ELIZABETH BECKER and SETH MYDANS

lead_paragraph: Mr. Sihanouk, who was alternately charming and ruthless, raised the stature of Cambodia and won its independence from French colonial rulers in 1953.

headline.main: Norodom Sihanouk, Cambodian Leader Through Shifting Allegiances, Dies at 89
headline.print_headline: Norodom Sihanouk, Cambodian Leader Through Shifting Allegiances, Dies at 89
